_xResult.title: Geode Maxi Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made satin dress with vegan leather collar
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made satin dress is absolutely breathtaking, no matter who sports it or which way you choose to style it. The rich satin fabric contrasts fabulously with the vegan leather collar, which cuts in a v-neck shape towards the chest and down the back. This dress is perfect for daywear in a pattern or evening events in the rich, dark black.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
